name: TTA Construction
address: Licensed in OK and AR (service area includes Arkansas)
description: A 100% Native American-owned construction company licensed in Oklahoma and Arkansas, specializing in commercial and residential projects. They offer general contracting and construction management services

name: Maska Builders
address: Primarily serves Native American Tribes in Oklahoma, but their services may extend to Arkansas
description: A Native American-owned, full-service construction firm providing general contracting, construction management, and design-build services. They have received awards for customer service and being a certified Indian business
